pages.text: $(c:/ftbquests open_book 256EB6DAF1808F35)&c$(l)---> Open Quest Page <--- $(/c)$(br)&rHaving difficulty with some mobs? You can power yourself up using the Mine and Slash &eInfusing Profession&r. &eScrolls&r can be used on your Gear to &erandomly apply a beneficial stat&r. This stat can be upgraded by using subsequent Infusion Scrolls.

See the $(c:/ftbquests open_book 5B97985430859986)&c$(l)&eM&S Professions chapter$(/c) for more information on how to use this system! Similarly, performing Profession activities will give you &eRested Combat Experience&r!

You can view how much Rested Experience you have in the Mine and Slash Hub by mousing over the Profession icon.
